section.p: Below you will find the legally regulated mandatory information on provider identification and legal information on the internet presence of the OCR-D project.

section.title: Provider
section.p: The transcription guidelines for creating transcriptions for Ground Truth are based, among other things, on the documentation of the DTA basic format. The guidelines are developed and published as part of the OCR-D project.
The provider of this website is the Duke August Library Wolfenbüttel in the legal sense.
HAB Wolfenbüttel is represented by its Director, Prof. Dr. Peter Burschel.

section.title: Technical Realization of the Documentation Pages
section.p: This documentation is based on the XML-documentation format DITA (Darwin Information Typing Architecture).
This website was created with oXygen XML Editors and adjusted to the design of the OCR-D project.
Technical realization and adjustment: Matthias Boenig, in cooperation with Susanne Haaf.
